Generated Narrative: ConceptMap R5-ConditionDefinition-element-map-to-R4

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0 to http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0


Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConditionDefinition|5.0.0 to Basicversion: 4.0.1)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
ConditionDefinition.meta (meta)is equivalent toResource.metaElement `ConditionDefinition.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.
ConditionDefinition.implicitRules (implicitRules)is equivalent toResource.implicitRulesElement `ConditionDefinition.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.
ConditionDefinition.language (language)is equivalent toResource.languageElement `ConditionDefinition.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.
ConditionDefinition.text (text)is equivalent toDomainResource.textElement `ConditionDefinition.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.
ConditionDefinition.contained (contained)is equivalent toDomainResource.containedElement `ConditionDefinition.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.
ConditionDefinition.identifier (identifier)is equivalent toBasic.identifierElement `ConditionDefinition.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `ConditionDefinition` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier` and is compatible, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `ConditionDefinition.identifier`: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/artifact-identifier`.

name: R5ConditionDefinitionElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 ConditionDefinition to FHIR R4 Basic
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 ConditionDefinition to FHIR R4.
